turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I need some help finding some new shoes. I'm looking for something stylish, but I don't really know where to start.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hi there! I can definitely help with that. To give you the best recommendations, could you tell me a bit more about what kind of style you're generally drawn to? Think casual, formal, sporty, or anything in between.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, I guess a mix of casual and a little bit of streetwear. Something I can wear day-to-day, you know? But nothing too crazy or flashy. I'm also not a fan of sneakers if that helps narrow things down.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I'm getting a picture. For casual streetwear that isn't sneakers, I'd suggest you look at some Chelsea boots, maybe some classic Adidas Sambas, or perhaps a pair of Chukka boots. Any of those sound appealing?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Chelsea boots are okay, but I'm not a huge fan of those. Sambas? Those are sneakers, right? I thought you said no sneakers! Honestly, I'm starting to get a little frustrated; are there even good non-sneaker options for streetwear or am I just out of luck?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: My apologies, the previous recommendation included a sneaker! Regarding non-sneaker streetwear, you certainly have options! Besides Chelsea and Chukka boots, you could explore some high-top or low-top skate shoes (think Vans or similar) in neutral colors. You can also consider some leather boat shoes; they can fit in with a streetwear look. Would any of these sound better?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: The skate shoes might work! I'll look into those. Thanks for the help; I appreciate you narrowing it down and pointing me in the right direction.
